articles.author: Simon Smale
articles.title: Tearful Daniel Ricciardo 'aware it could be it' for his F1 career
articles.description: Daniel Ricciardo may well have turned his final corner in a F1 car after an emotional interview following the Singapore Grand Prix.
articles.content:
The trademark smile is never far away from Daniel Ricciardo.
But the tears glistening in his eyes betrayed the truth that the affable Australian's Formula 1 career may well be over after 257 races.… [+6221 chars]
